caller_intent: Gloria is following up with Mark to update him on the progress of obtaining insurance quotes for his business and setting a timeline for sending a proposal by the 11th.
resolution_steps: Gloria informs Mark that Alliance Insurance is working on quotes for his business.
She confirms a timeline to call back and send a proposal by the 11th (Thursday or tomorrow evening).
Mentions that further discussion will occur after the proposal is sent.
summary: Gloria from Alliance Insurance updates Mark on the status of his business insurance quotes, setting a timeline for a proposal by the 11th and confirming follow-up discussions. The call focuses on progress updates and next steps.
